content: >this pattern is also available as part of the of the fall in love with autumn 1 pattern bundle which includes a total of 37 patterns for the price of only 4 > >see https //itchinforsomestitchin com/fall-in-love-with-autumn-pattern-bundle/ for details simply sweet and super easy this chunky bowtie head warmer is fresh and feminine plus it s a cinch to put together perfect for even the newest of crochet beginners and whips up in less than 30 minutes it couldn t be simpler to create a fabulous head warmer you ll love to wear finished dimensions the ear warmer can be easily made to any of the dimensions in the chart provided in the pattern note width is 2-4-inches depending head size or personal preference see additional notes in the pattern 1 https //itchinforsomestitchin com/fall-in-love-with-autumn-pattern-bundle/
